title: Supportive colleagues could be the key to health and fairness at work

title_detail.value: Supportive colleagues could be the key to health and fairness at work

summary: The attitudes and behaviors of colleagues towards people returning to work from sick leave can have a big impact on whether or not a worker feels they are fairly treated by their organization.
